name: Zucchini (Courgette)
benefits: Zucchini has very high water content and extremely low calorie density. Featured in ratatouille-inspired Puy lentil soup. Part of the optimal weight-loss diet with low glycemic load and high water content.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen vegetables - multiple servings daily

quotes: The famous French vegetable stew is the inspiration for this lentil soup, made with Puy lentils, of course.
